item.title: Internationalization
item.description: C/AL Coding Guidelines Internationalization Find the C/AL guidelines by expanding the menu in the left.

item.title: Localizability

item.title: Readability
item.description: C/AL Coding Guidelines Readability Generally, all readability rules are Microsoft style choices only. You can use them to keep consistency with the existing code. Find the C/AL guidelines by expanding the menu in the left.
